job_title.description: The job titles specific to the company can be defined in this option. To add an entry, go to Admin>> Job>> Job Titles and click “Add”

job_description.description: You could describe the role of the employee in the company through this feature

job_specification.description: You could describe the job role of the employee in the company through this feature which appears under job details. The default will be Not defined.

file_upload_notice.description: The files uploading cannot be over 1MB

note.description: You may add a note and click “Hire” to confirm the action.

cancel.description: Cancel a leave request , session etc..

required.description: Admin can create a document template body for employees by using tokens required

start_date.description: Start date of current leave period

end_date.description: When defining the current leave period, the system will automatically set the “End Date” as to have a one-calendar year leave period.

from_date.description: The specific date from which employees time and attendance records are extracted.

to_date.description: The specific date from which employees time and attendance records are extracted.

duration.description: Calculate the duration of the leave period.

comments.description: You may enter any important notes regarding some information.

tuesday.description: One of the days of the week

wednesday.description: One of the days of the week

thursday.description: One of the days of the week

friday.description: One of the days of the week

saturday.description: One of the days of the week

sunday.description: One of the days of the week

sub_unit.description: Add a sub- unit to the company structure, go to Admin>> Organization>> Structure and right click on the particular sub unit

back.description: Click “Back” and the action will be reflected

no_employees_match_filters.source: No employees match the selected filters
no_employees_match_filters.target: No employees match the selected filters

employee.description: Staff currently working at your company.

view.description: Admin has the privileged to view assigned goal/leave/tasks of all employees

job_titles.description: The job titles specific to the company can be defined in this option. To add an entry, go to Admin>> Job>> Job Titles and click “Add”

add_job_title.description: The position that is needed by the company ex: Manager IT

edit_job_title.description: Alter the position that is needed by the company ex: Manager IT

work_shift.description: HR Admin can define work shifts for an individual or a group of employees. To add an entry, go to Admin>> Job>> Work Shifts and click “Add”

add_work_shifts.description: Admin can define work shifts for an individual or a group of employees. To add an entry, go to Admin>> Job>> Work Shifts

edit_work_shifts.description: Admin can edit the defined work shifts for an individual or a group of employees. To add an entry, go to Admin>> Job>> Work Shifts and go to an existing work shift record and click “Edit”.

shift_name.description: When HR Admin defining work shifts for an individual or a group of employees, shift name should be specified

duration_per_day.description: Calculate the duration of the work shift

leave_period.description: leave period can be manually set by selecting a ‘Start Month’, ‘Start Date’ and ‘Duration’ Ex : Jan-01-2015 to Dec-31-2015 to the current year.

start_month.description: Custom Leave Period - leave period can be manually set by selecting a ‘Start Month’, ‘Start Date’ and 'End Date'

apply_leave.description: Allows a user to apply for leave.In the dashboard module all the employees who have applied for leave will be shown in the form of a pictorial representation, e.g. bar graph, pie chart etc.

assign_leave.description: Admin can assign leave to employee

leave_type.description: Leave types can be defined with country-based leave rules, custom/hire-date based leave periods, apply-restriction rules, leave accrual rules and leave carry forward rules.

leave_balance.description: The number of leave available to be taken for an employee.

partial_days.description: For multiple day applications, you can select any “Partial Days”.

leave_balance_details.description: To view leave balance details, select the leave type from the drop down menu. Check the Leave Balance available.

pending_approval.description: he Status of the session will be “Pending Approval” until an Admin user approves the session.

start_day.description: Start date of current leave period.

end_day.description: When applying leave for a date range with desired partial days the employee has to select this option.

is_entitlement_situational.description: By clicking the “Is Entitlement Situational” option, the leave type will be excluded from reports unless there is some activity. For example: maternity leave, jury duty leave.

leave_types.description: The leave types can be defined in this option. To add an entry, go to Leave>> Configure>> Leave Types and click “Add”

add_leave_type.description: The leave types that is needed by the company.

edit_leave_type.description: Alter the leave type that is needed by the company

add_leave_entitlement.description: Add the leave amount to which a person has a right to have.

leave_entitlements.description: This feature enables the HR Admin with admin rights to Add and View Leave Entitlements for each leave type for all employees.

my_leave_entitlements.description: If the user is an ESS User, then he will only see the “My Leave Entitlements and Usage Report” option under Leave>>Reports

updating_entitlement.description: Give the entitlements to the employee and update leave entitlements

matching_employees.description: This shows list of matching employees who match with best match rule criteria which used to filter candidates successfully.

edit_leave_entitlement.description: Edit the leave amount to which a person has a right to have.

work_week.description: The administrator will be able to define the work weeks for all employees based in different locations/countries.To define work week, go to Leave>> Configure>> Work Week

holidays.description: The holidays can be configured in this option. To add an entry, go to Leave>> Configure>> Holidays and click “Add”

full_day_half_day.description: Full Day/ Half Day in Edit/Save Holiday screens

repeats_annually.description: Repeats Annually in Edit/Save Holiday screens

situational_leave.description: Header in entitlement situational field help in Add/Edit leave type screen

entitlement_situational_description.source:
These leave will be excluded from reports unless there's some activity.
 E.g. maternity leave, jury duty leave.
entitlement_situational_description.target:
These leave will be excluded from reports unless there's some activity.
 E.g. maternity leave, jury duty leave.
entitlement_situational_description.description: description entitlement situational field help in Add/Edit leave type screen

leave_list.description: The leave list is available to the Admin and ESS – Supervisors. It shows all leave requests by the employees.

my_leave_list.description: ESS-Employee can view his detailed leave application and his leave calendar which will display all his leave during a particular month.

show_leave_with_status.description: Show leave with current status of them in the leave report

include_past_employees.description: You may also include past employees with your search when generating Leave Entitlements and Usage Reports of employees.

leave_request_comments.description: you can add a comment if necessary, when you request for a leave from your supervisor / Admin

balance_not_sufficient.description: There is no sufficient leave balance for the current leave period.

overlapping_leave_request_found.description: When request for a leave with same leave type and same no of days, a error message would appear saying 'Overlapping Leave Request Found'.

workshift_length_exceeded_due_to_the_fol.source: Workshift Length Exceeded Due To the Following Leave Requests
workshift_length_exceeded_due_to_the_fol.target: Workshift Length Exceeded Due To the Following Leave Requests

leave_entitlement_and_usage_report.description: Once the appropriate fields are selected, the Admin can then click “View” and will be presented with the leave report of all employees.The report can also show leave usage and entitlements for the “Previous Period” as well as the “Next Period”.

my_leave_entitlement_and_usage_report.source: My Leave Entitlements and Usage Report
my_leave_entitlement_and_usage_report.target: My Leave Entitlements and Usage Report
my_leave_entitlement_and_usage_report.description: if he/she is also an ESS user to the system, he/she can view for leave entitlements and usage of leave by themselves (Leave>>Reports >> My Leave Entitlements and Usage Report).

generate_for.description: If the “Employee” option is selected under “Generate For” the HR Admin can generate the leave entitlement and usage report for any employee

no_leave_types_with_leave_balance.source: No Leave Types with Leave Balance
no_leave_types_with_leave_balance.target: No Leave Types with Leave Balance
no_leave_types_with_leave_balance.description: For all the leave types, a particular employee doesn't have any leave remaining. e.g.casual, annual
